original_title: Una por una (tratando que no se borre)
overview: Eduardo is 35 years old, lives in the city of Gaiman, is an agronomist and leads a quiet life. However, in the context of the fall of the Due Obedience and Endpoint Laws in 2005, he decided together with his family to take up the case regarding the disappearance of his brother, who had been paralyzed since 1987.
title: Una por una (tratando que no se borre)
